name: Space Spaceships
description:
Controls

WD or Arrow keys to move paddle.

Spacebar or left mouse click to release ball from paddle.

Description

A fun retro style arcade game. We worked on this project as a team of three. We used a mix of custom assets and free 8bit space shoot assets from itch (https://gvituri.itch.io/space-shooter).

Collaborators

We made this game as a team of three (drphilgood, rareed2, timmmm...)
